document.bingtitle: Newsvine - Store Owner Shoots Teen in Self-Defense, Killing Him
document.webtitle: Store Owner Shoots Teen in Self-Defense, Killing Him - maddad's column on Newsvine
document.description: ... the police, ignoring the polices order to leave him ... case, years ago, where a kid robbed the same fast food restaurant ... care if all one has on them to steal is 7-11 receipt ...
